1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural-born entrepreneurs, Aries tend to thrive in fast-paced environments like stock markets.
2. Taurus - 5/10 - Practical and risk-averse, Tauruses often prefer stable investments with steady returns.
3. Gemini - 7/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis excel at finding opportunities in rapidly changing markets.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Emotionally intelligent Cancers are sensitive to market fluctuations, but their intuition can guide them to smart decisions.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Confident Leos take calculated risks, leveraging their charisma and persuasive abilities to get ahead.
6. Virgo - 8/10 - Analytical Virgos excel at crunching numbers and identifying patterns, making them skilled traders.
7. Libra - 4/10 - Diplomatic Libras prefer balanced approaches, often prioritizing stability over potential gains.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Intense Scorpios are naturally intuitive and perceptive, allowing them to sniff out lucrative opportunities.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous Sagittarians thrive in environments that allow for exploration and discovery, making them well-suited to trading.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Practical and ambitious Capricorns are skilled at building long-term wealth, but may be cautious in their early investments.
11. Aquarius - 6/10 - Humanitarian Aquarians often prioritize social responsibility over profit, but can still make smart investment decisions.
12. Pisces - 5/10 - Empathetic Pisces are sensitive to market emotions and may struggle with risk-taking, but their intuition can guide them to wise choices.
